sentence:
路 Shares of Procter & Gamble Co. PG increased 1.6% after it posted net sales of $16.08 billion surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $16.00 billion

路 Mastercard Inc. MA posted revenues of $3.1 billion which exceeded the Zacks Consensus Estimate by 4.0%, increasing 13% year over year

路 Bristol-Myers Squibb Co. BMY reported second-quarter 2017 earnings of $0.74 per share which surpassed the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.73, increasing 7% from the year-ago period

路 Shares of Anheuser-Busch InBev BUD declined 8.2% after the earnings per share of $0.95 decreased 10.4% from $1.06 earned in the year-ago quarter and also lagged the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.14
